definition: Malacca or Melaka (town and state in Malaysia), also strait between Malaysia and Sumatra
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Only those pre-booked on Malacca excursions may disembark.
sentences.chinese: 惟有已預定馬六甲上岸觀光活動的乘客方可下船。

sentences.english: I must abandon vessel after piracy in the west mouth of Malacca Strait.
sentences.chinese: 我船在馬六甲海峽西出口被海盜搶劫後必須棄船。

sentences.english: Having said that, I will not write off the challenges from Selangor and Malacca.
sentences.chinese: 話雖如此，我就不寫了從雪蘭莪州和馬六甲的挑戰。

sentences.english: That includes, for example, the Strait of Malacca.
sentences.chinese: 例如，那包括馬六甲海峽。

sentences.english: Four-fifths of China's entire supply of oil comes through the Strait of Malacca.
sentences.chinese: 中國五分之四的石油供應要經馬六甲海峽。

sentences.english: Jane ZhaoXing telex o seven and rushed to the malacca but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 簡阿七和肇興收到電報趕往馬六甲，卻爲時已晚。

sentences.english: The stem of the rattan palm, used for making canes and umbrella handles.
sentences.chinese: 馬六甲白藤莖白藤櫚的莖，用於製造手杖和傘柄。

sentences.english: The Strait of Malacca is one of the worlds hottest and most crucial strategic choke points.
sentences.chinese: 馬六甲海峽是世界上最危險和最重要的戰略要衝之一。

sentences.english: Nearly nine-tenths of its oil imports cross the Indian Ocean and pass through the Malacca Strait.
sentences.chinese: 它的石油進口的十分之九要經過印度洋和馬六甲海峽。

definition: Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
